title: Compliance Training Session Audio - TRID Q&A Excerpt
description: Audio excerpt from quarterly compliance training session covering TRID disclosure requirements. Includes Q&A segment where loan officers ask about tolerance cure timing and e-consent procedures. Reveals knowledge gaps in field staff regarding recent regulatory updates.
consent_reference: Standard training recording notice per Employee Handbook Section 8.3

key_timestamps.topic: Q&A: LO asks about tolerance cure deadline - incorrect assumption corrected
Q&A: Confusion about CD redisclosure triggers

asr_transcript_excerpt: Q: 'If we discover a tolerance violation after closing, how long do we have to cure it?' A: 'You have 60 days from consummation to refund the excess... but I want to emphasize, the real issue we're seeing is that our LEs aren't going out within three business days. That's the root cause we need to fix.'
